title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Section 181(2)(a)) (No. 3) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (section 181(2)(a)) (no 3) order 2024

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than 
sections 50, 50A, 50B and 181 of that Act) shall not apply to the development 
described in Part 1 of the Schedule proposed to be carried out by me or on my 
behalf.
text_norm: 2 planning development act 2000 (no 30 2000) (other section 50 50a 50b 181 act) shall apply development described part 1 schedule proposed carried behalf

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth
text_raw:
3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth 

anniversary of the date on which this Order comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [481] 

Schedule 

Part 1 

Site: 
2 of Schedule) 

Crooksling, Brittas, Co Dublin (As identified on site map at Part 

Address: 

St Brigids Nursing Home, Crooksling, Brittas, Co Dublin 

Description: Development of up to 60 tents initially and future plans for up to 
160 modular units (61.5m2), and associated ancillary works including external 
general/amenity areas, landscaping, 1.8m to 2.4m high security fencing, external 
lighting, CCTV surveillance system, pipework, storage facilities, electrical 
distribution boxes for the purposes of accommodating applicants within the 
meaning of the European Communities (Receptions Conditions) Regulations 
2018 (S.I. 230 of 2018) to include:

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 1. Development to provide for the accommodation of in or around 540
text_raw:
1. Development to provide for the accommodation of in or around 540 
applicants within the meaning of the European Communities (Receptions 
Conditions) Regulations 2018.
text_norm: 1 development provide accommodation around 540 applicant within meaning european community (receptions conditions) regulation 2018

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 2. The development works will replace the current temporary tented
text_raw:
2. The development works will replace the current temporary tented 
accommodation. The space shall ordinarily not be less than 4.65m2 per 
person. The ceiling height shall be 2.4m high minimum.
text_norm: 2 development work replace current temporary tented accommodation space shall ordinarily le 4.65m2 per person ceiling height shall 2.4m high minimum

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 3. The provision of sanitary and shower facilities. The ratio of WC
text_raw:
3. The provision of sanitary and shower facilities. The ratio of WC 
provision to bed spaces shall be at least 1 per every 8 bed spaces and 1 
in 20 to be disabled access compliant. Hand wash basins with hot and 
cold-water supply shall be provided in the ratio of 1 per 6 bed spaces and 
1 in 20 to be disabled access compliant. Showers shall be provided at the 
ratio of 1 per 12 bed spaces and 1 in 20 to be disabled access compliant.
text_norm: 3 provision sanitary shower facility ratio wc provision bed space shall least 1 per every 8 bed space 1 20 disabled access compliant hand wash basin hot cold-water supply shall provided ratio 1 per 6 bed space 1 20 disabled access compliant shower shall provided ratio 1 per 12 bed space 1 20 disabled access compliant

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 4. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains
text_raw:
4. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains 

sewage system on site.
text_norm: 4 proposed sanitary module connected existing main sewage system site

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 5. Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities.
text_raw: 5. Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities.
text_norm: 5 provision storage hot cold water sanitary facility

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 6. The external general/amenity areas are to be provided with security
text_raw:
6. The external general/amenity areas are to be provided with security 
fencing, adequate external lighting and also protected by a certified 
external CCTV surveillance system.
text_norm: 6 external general amenity area provided security fencing adequate external lighting also protected certified external cctv surveillance system

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 7. The provision of suitable and adequate pest and vermin proof refuse
text_raw:
7. The provision of suitable and adequate pest and vermin proof refuse 

storage facilities.
text_norm: 7 provision suitable adequate pest vermin proof refuse storage facility

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 8. The installations for the supply of gas (LPG), oil and electricity including
text_raw:
8. The installations for the supply of gas (LPG), oil and electricity including 
pipework, storage facilities and electrical distribution boxes including 
pipework, storage facilities and electrical distribution boxes and any 
necessary ancillary works required in relation to same.
text_norm: 8 installation supply gas (lpg) oil electricity including pipework storage facility electrical distribution box including pipework storage facility electrical distribution box necessary ancillary work required relation same

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A)) (NO.
heading: 9. The site perimeter to be enclosed/secured with 1.8m to 2.4m high
text_raw:
9. The site perimeter to be enclosed/secured with 1.8m to 2.4m high 
security fencing and the external general/amenity areas to be provided 
with adequate external lighting and also protected by a certified external 
CCTV surveillance system. 

 
 
 
 
 10. Such further and other ancillary works, to include site development 
works and landscaping, to facilitate the above works as may be required. 

[481] 5 

Part 2 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [481] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 September, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth.
